item.description:
A little last minute but this is a cross posting from the AWS Wine Meetup Group.   We have a few open slots to the group's holiday sherry tasting and extend the invitation to the White Wine group to join in the festivities.  If you have already RSVP'd from another group, please do not respond again here.

Please join us for a Holiday sherry tasting at the Bakers. Look for the Yellow house with lots of lights.

This holiday gathering will feature a selection of sherrys and Spanish themed foods

La Gitana, bodegas Hidalgo·

  • Gutierrez Colosia, Fino (dry) Jerez/Xeres/Sherry,

· Tio Pepe, Palomino Fino, Jerez,

· Pedro Romero, Amontillado (medium)

· Lustau Escuadrilla, Amontillado

· Williams & Humbert, Dry Sack, Medium Dry,

· El Maestro, Oloroso -15 anos-,

· Alvear, Solera 1927 (system started),

and more...

Spanish food paring suggestions;

Deborah is planning a spanish chicken crock pot dish.

Spanish cheeses, olives, spicy meats, Chorizo, seafoods, Tapas, dried Mediterainian fruits and nuts are excellent.

Sherries are not just for before and after meals but are fine with the entrees, particularly the finos.

Similar to Mexican dishes, with lots of Olive Oils, garlic, spicy heat, paprika, cumin, potatos, tomatos, onions, and omeletes.

And lets not forget the sweets...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the yellow house with lots of holiday lights on outer side of circle

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: AWS Sherry Tasting
